author: ChatGPT
content: 아래는 비공개 GitHub 저장소에 논문 .tex 파일을 업로드할 때 보안을 고려한 README 템플릿이야. 최대한 외부 접근과 무단 이용을 방지하는 톤으로 구성해봤어: --- markdown Quantum Faith Framework Private Repository Confidential Notice This repository contains proprietary LaTeX source code for the manuscript: " Grace-Controlled Quantum Collapse and Superposition: A Christ-Centered Resonance Model " - All .tex , .bib , and related data files are strictly private . - Access is limited to the primary author yourID unless explicitly extended. Security Declaration - This repository is not licensed for open-source or public use. - Any form of duplication, distribution, or modification without written consent is strictly prohibited . - All file commits are tracked and timestamped for integrity verification . Spiritual Integrity Statement This research is rooted in a theology of grace and obedience to Jesus Christ. All interpretations and technical structures reflect a commitment to the centrality of Christ in all domains of creation spiritual and scientific. Soli Deo Gloria. --- 원한다면 이 내용을 .md 로 저장해서 같이 커밋해줘도 좋아. 보안 문구 와 신앙 고백 이 함께 들어가는 게 이번 연구의 정체성 그대로라서 더 의미 있지. 필요하면 .gitignore 나 .gitattributes 보안 추가도 도와줄게!
